item.title: Nonlinear estimation: Full Bayesian, MLE and MAP
item.description: Intro Recently I have read “State Estimation for Robotics” book and came across a good example on one-dimensional nonlinear estimation problem: the estimation of the position of a landmark from stereo-camera data. Distance from stereo-images The camera image is a projection of the world on the image plane. The depth perceptions arises from disparity of 3d point (landmark) on two images, obtained from left and right cameras. $$disparity = x_{left} - x_{right}$$
